description:
There is this saying that goes a little something like this: “Guns don’t kill people; people with guns kill people.” Logically, the same could be said for ninja swords. However, leftist politicians don’t tend to make policy under the guise of being logically correct. This is why citizens don’t have gun protections and why UK citizens will no longer be allowed to own ninja swords.

BREAKING: Ninja swords banned in the UK. You will soon be jailed for owning one. pic.twitter.com/CuI6Pyr0ti
— End Wokeness (@EndWokeness) March 27, 2025
title: After banning guns and knives, the UK has announced a new ban on  Ninja swords. Yes, you read that right...

description:
If sex and gender are two different things, like the left pretends it is, there would be no reason to medically transition. Joe could dress like Sally without all the pharmaceutical intervention. And despite the left’s attempt to make womanhood meaningless, trans women “can never become a woman.”

This is why Trump said what the vast majority of Americans know to be true, which is that despite how someone feels deep down inside, a person “born with male DNA in every cell of [their] body” will always be a man, no matter how hard they try.


Trump: “No matter how many surgeries you have or chemicals you inject, if you’re born with male DNA in every cell of your body, you can never become a woman.”

pic.twitter.com/s7
title: Trump To Trans Women: “You can never become a woman”

description:
On Wednesday, President Trump announced a 25% tariff on imported vehicles. Today’s show breaks down how this will rejuvenate the auto industry.

"The issue that we run into is now you have to compete with slave labor because of the internationalization on the left," Crowder said.

According to Fox Business:

The president said he will impose a 25% tariff on all imported autos, up from 2.5% previously. He indicated the auto tariffs will take effect on April 2, when his reciprocal tariff plans are also expected to be announced.

Trump, who views tariffs as a way to bring in tax revenue to finance his plans for tax cuts while spurring a revitalization of domestic m
title: Watch: What Trump’s Massive Auto Tariffs Are Really About

description:
It turns out that when you have a point that is not only extremely lacking but also deeply unpopular with half the country, you should not use it as a marketing tool. Rachel Zegler never got that memo, and instead of keeping her mouth shut, she lectured the unwoke masses while accidentally destroying any chance her film could have had.

Jonah Platt, the son of one of the producers of "Snow White," has called out Zegler for allowing her “narcissism” to ruin the film.

NEW: The son of 'Snow White' producer Marc Platt absolutely unleashes on Rachel Zegler for ruining his father's movie.

Jonah Platt is ripping the 23-year-old actress for getting political and ruining Snow White.

The comment from Platt was found on Instagram after one user asked…
title: Son of "Snow White" producer goes SCORCHED EARTH on Rachel Zegler for destroying his dad's film: "Do you really want to do this?"

description:
The House DOGE subcommittee held a long overdue hearing on PBS and NPR, how Trump’s newly announced 25% tariff on all auto imports into the US will breathe life into the auto industry, the Danish PM is butthurt Vice President JD Vance is headed to Greenland, my half asian lawyer Bill Richmond dives into the lawsuit launched against the Trump admin over the Signal leak debacle AND MORE!

NPR AND PBS HEARING

  • CPB Operating Budget
title: Sources: What Trump’s Massive Auto Tariffs Are Really About

description:
Katherine Maher, the CEO of NPR (which is funded by taxpayers like you), like most left-wing elitists, enjoys virtue-signaling about how horrible her fellow white people are. Yet get her under oath, and she is suddenly all like "New Twitter account, who dis?"

That was the case at yesterday's DOGE hearing, where Rep. Brandon Gill wondered about some things Maher has said publicly, as she claims to be an unbiased journalist.

Two key points to note:

  • Maher was on the hill to beg DOGE not to gut hundreds of millions given to Public Broadcasting.
  • NPR -- which, again, is funded by your tax dollars -- is more left-wing than even MSNBC or Buzzfeed.

Now on with the smackdown.
title: NPR's taxpayer-funded CEO gets called out for her anti-White rhetoric; her response exposes the elitist Left

description:
It's funny when we find ourselves saying the same things as our opponents, but in a different way. The left and the media (but I repeat myself) are all like "Jasmine Crockett is a new leader in the Democrat Party." We on the right, also, are all like, "Jasmine Crockett IS a new leader in the Democrat Party." We might throw in a ROTFLMAO in at the end. As you might expect, President Donald J. Trump is less than enamored with her tomfoolery.

Trump was a guest on VINCE (heard exclusively on RumbleLive) and asked our Commander-In-Chief if he had any thoughts on the progressive thot leader.

🔥 @POTUS clowns @RepJasmine: "S
title: "She's a lowlife": Donald Trump UNLOADS on "low IQ" Democrat party leader Jasmine Crockett
